Important Articles.headline: Josh Lipton examines the top stories on Wall Street as part of today's Market Minute. Broadcom (AVGO) stock gains after providing a strong outlook on continuing artificial intelligence (AI) investments. Walgreens (WBA) is set to go private in a $10 billion deal with Sycamore Partners. Costco (COST) shares are under pressure after its profits missed estimates amid tariff concerns and consumer cautiousness. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
Important Articles.title: Broadcom, Walgreens goes private, Costco misses: Market Minute

Important Articles.headline: Walgreens has had an impressive run over the past six months. While the S&P 500 has been flat, the stock has returned 22.7% and now trades at $11.12. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
Important Articles.title: Walgreens (WBA): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?

Important Articles.headline: The Dow slumped more than 300 points Friday afternoon before recovering ground to trade higher. That followed a days-long selloff that had markets on track for their worst week in about two years amid a cascade of tariffs and tariff relief measures that left investors reeling with uncertainty.
Important Articles.title: The Dow swings wildly as Trump tariffs fuel the stock market's worst week in 2 years
